mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, e.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM event WHERE enddate >= sysdate ORDER BY regdate DESC ) e ) WHERE rnum <= 4
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, e.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM event WHERE enddate >= sysdate AND event_div = '영화' ORDER BY regdate DESC ) e ) WHERE rnum <= 4
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, e.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM event WHERE enddate >= sysdate AND event_div = '극장' ORDER BY regdate DESC ) e ) WHERE rnum <= 4
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, e.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM event WHERE enddate >= sysdate AND event_div = '시사회/무대인사' ORDER BY regdate DESC ) e ) WHERE rnum <= 4
SELECT * FROM event WHERE event_no = #{event_no} ORDER BY regdate DESC

SELECT e.*, movie_name FROM event e, movie m WHERE e.relate_cd = m.movie_cd AND e.enddate >= sysdate AND event_div = '영화' AND (movie_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR event_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ORDER BY e.regdate DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM event e, movie m WHERE e.relate_cd = m.movie_cd AND e.enddate >= sysdate AND event_div = '영화' AND (movie_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR event_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') AND event_div = '영화'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM event e, theater t WHERE e.relate_cd = t.admin_cd AND e.enddate >= sysdate AND event_div = '극장' AND (thr_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR event_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
